alert.note: Alert for Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 3:44PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Dale, Henry, Houston and western Early Counties through 430 PM EDT/330 PM CDT/... At 343 PM EDT/243 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Headland, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Cottonwood, Headland, Dothan, Ozark, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Cowarts, Newton, Webb, Columbia, Pinckard, Rehobeth, Grimes, Avon, Newville, Napier Field and Gordon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
